text: Frank Joseph Guarini (born August 20, 1924) is an American Democratic Party politician. He represented New Jersey in the United States House of Representatives, where he represented the now-defunct Fourteenth Congressional District from 1979 to 1993. Guarini served in the New Jersey Senate from 1965 to 1972. In 1970, Guarini unsuccessfully challenged incumbent U.S. Senator Harrison A. Williams in the Democratic Primary, losing 66%-34%. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website of Frank J. title: Frank Joseph Guarini
